trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Roswell
There were no other sightings in Roswell on or around June 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a object moving left to right near Roswell - then stopped and hovered and then disappeared. Lasted only a few moments. At first -thought it might be a airplane or something like that - then it moved slowly as if searching and then completely disappeared. I continued to drive to see if I could see it again - with no luck.
Summary: saw it move from left to right -stop and then disappeared.
